Merge pull request #5 from adammenges/master

Corrected Solarized Light colors
Corrected Solarized Light colors, couldn't see a few of the colors with the background used.
Mountain Lion notes

Set light text colors to the recommended values.

Based on http://ethanschoonover.com/solarized#usage-development
Change cursor to the "comments/secondary" color.
Make the background colors opaque.

Change the red color value.

This matches the RGB value specified in the Solarized documentation:

SOLARIZED HEX     16/8 TERMCOL  XTERM/HEX   L*A*B      RGB         HSB
--------- ------- ---- -------  ----------- ---------- ----------- -----------
red       #dc322f  1/1 red      160 #d70000 50  65  45 220  50  47   1  79  86

Don't use bold fonts.

Bold fonts are overloaded to show the "bright" colors in Solarized. The bright
colors are not actually brighter versions of the base colors, they are
different entirely. They shouldn't also be displayed in bold.
Set default font to Monace. Quit on shell exit.

Merge pull request #3 from drewish/master

Use inverted color for selection

The previous selection color was very close to the background making it hard to tell where the area began and ended. By using the inverted theme's background color (base 3 for dark and base 03 for light) the selection is now much more apparent.
